purpleculture_pinyin:
piàn
to cheat; to swindle; to deceive; to get on (a horse etc) by swinging one leg over
обманывать; мошенничать; обмануть; сесть (на лошадь и т. д.), перекинув одну ногу

(Simplified: 骗)
Pictophonetic: 扁 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
騙取 [ piàn qǔ ]: to gain by cheating
騙人 [ piàn rén ]: to cheat sb; a scam

heisig_chinese_memo: The Greeks cheated (tricked) the Trojans by hiding in the Trojan Horse, which actually had a secret door from which the hidden soldiers would emerge. It was a brilliant tactic that would be recorded in the tomes of history.

Ru_trainchinese: piàn: (глаг) обманывать; выманивать, получать обманом; садиться на (лошадь или велосипед)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the flat (扁) horse (馬) is deceiving you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The horse cheats his owner by keeping an extra stable key behind an old book cover so he can run free at night.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " horse " and " bian ", the original meaning is leaping on a horse, and then it often means deceit. "Ji Yun": "Let’s leap and ride a horse. Or deceive with a book." Tang Zhangzhuo's "Magazine in the Wild" Volume Four: "Long bow and short arrow, Shu horse is deceived."

" Cheat " can mean crossing. Yuan Wang Yuanheng "Drunk Taiping·Jing Shi": "The staggered body that throws money, the leg folds that deceive the pink wall."

" Cheat " is often used to deceive. "Zihui‧ Mabu": "Cheat, today is a lie." Song Liu Kezhuang "Geng Shen Zhao Dui": "Chen Wei has been in the country for three years. To set up a scam for the slaughter of the world, the ruling and the opposition parties talked with the thief and said: "If you are not the same, you will be attacked.""
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " horse " and " bian ", the original meaning is to jump on the horse, and then it often means deceit.
humanum_full_description:
從「馬」，「扁」聲，本義為躍上馬，後常表示誑騙。《集韻》：「騗，躍而乘馬也。或書作騙。」唐張鷟《朝野僉載》卷四：「長弓短度箭，蜀馬臨堦騙。」

　　「騙」可表示跨越。元汪元亨〈醉太平‧警世〉：「擲金錢踅的身軀趄，騙粉牆掂的腿脡折。」

　　「騙」常用作誑騙。《字彙‧馬部》：「騙，今作誑騙字。」宋劉克莊〈庚申召對〉：「臣惟國家三數年來，凶相弄權，以富彊自詭，輔聖天子而行霸政，為天下宰而設騙局，朝野之人，相與竊議曰：『相非相，狙也。』」
humanum_short_description: 從「馬」，「扁」聲，本義為躍上馬，後常表示誑騙。

騙 (Simplified: 骗)

    • 扁 [ biǎn ] flat; board, sign, tablet

騙人 [ piàn rén ]: to cheat sb; a scam

從「 馬 」，「 扁 」聲，本義為躍上馬，後常表示誑騙。《集韻》：「騗，躍而乘馬也。或書作騙。」唐張鷟《朝野僉載》卷四：「長弓短度箭，蜀馬臨堦騙。」 「 騙 」可表示跨越。元汪元亨〈醉太平‧警世〉：「擲金錢踅的身軀趄，騙粉牆掂的腿脡折。」 「 騙 」常用作誑騙。《字彙‧馬部》：「騙，今作誑騙字。」宋劉克莊〈庚申召對〉：「臣惟國家三數年來，凶相弄權，以富彊自詭，輔聖天子而行霸政，為天下宰而設騙局，朝野之人，相與竊議曰：『相非相，狙也。』」
From the sound of " horse" and " bian", the original meaning is leaping on a horse, and then it often means deceit. "Ji Yun": "Let’s leap and ride a horse. Or deceive with a book." Tang Zhangzhuo's "Magazine in the Wild" Volume Four: "Long bow and short arrow, Shu horse is deceived." " Cheat" can mean crossing. Yuan Wang Yuanheng "Drunk Taiping·Jing Shi": "The staggered body that throws money, the leg folds that deceive the pink wall." " Cheat" is often used to deceive. "Zihui‧ Mabu": "Cheat, today is a lie." Song Liu Kezhuang "Geng Shen Zhao Dui": "Chen Wei has been in the country for three years. To set up a scam for the slaughter of the world, the ruling and the opposition parties talked with the thief and said: "If you are not the same, you will be attacked.""

騙字的基本解释

騙
piàn
见“骗”。

騙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［piàn］
［《集韻》匹羨切，去線，滂。］
“骗1”的繁体字。亦作“騗1”。
(1)侧身抬起一条腿跨上；骑。
(2)跨越；超越。
(3)欺骗；哄骗。

騙字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騙； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1441第21
【集韻】同騗。【正字通】今俗借爲誆騙字。

騙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
騙字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［piàn］
["Ji Yun" The horse is enviously cut, go to the line, and furious. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "Cheat 1". Also known as "Yi 1".
(1) Raise one leg up sideways; ride.
(2) Leap over; transcend.
(3) Deception; deception.
